sources.title: Skybound
sources.description: Title: Skybound Summary: Captain John Kent is a pilot in charge of the border patrol. Two crooks who head up a smuggling operation, Morley and his associate Faber, are trying to outwit Kent. The smugglers hope that... Directed by: Bernard B. Ray Actors: Production Company: C.C. Burr Productions Inc. Release Date: 23 September 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Captain John Kent is a pilot in charge of the border patrol. Two crooks who head up a smuggling operation, Morley and his associate Faber, are trying to outwit Kent. The smugglers hope that they can influence Kent's younger brother Doug to help them, and they employ an attractive singer in an attempt to win Doug over.

sources.title: Skybound (1935) ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Lloyd Hughes, Edward J. Nugent, Lona Andre
Director: Bernard B. Ray

Smugglers use a sultry lounge singer to entice a hot-shot pilot into helping them outsmart his brother, the captain of the border patrol.

metadata.Plot: Captain John Kent is a pilot in charge of the border patrol. Two crooks who head up a smuggling operation, Morley and his associate Faber, are trying to outwit Kent. The smugglers hope that they can influence Kent's younger brother Doug to help them, and they employ an attractive singer in an attempt to win Doug over.
metadata.Actors: Lloyd Hughes, Edward J. Nugent, Lona Andre
